# atlas Demos

## Godot Atlas Export

Export atlas metadata to Godot .tres resource files for game character sprites.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_idle", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_1", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_2", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "palette", "name": "coin_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{g}": "#FFD700"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "coin", "palette": "coin_pal", "size": [3, 3], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "walk", "frames": ["player_walk_1", "player_walk_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="godot">
</div>

## Godot Export File Generation

Generates AtlasTexture, SpriteFrames, and AnimationLibrary .tres files.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_idle", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_1", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_2", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "palette", "name": "coin_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{g}": "#FFD700"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "coin", "palette": "coin_pal", "size": [3, 3], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "walk", "frames": ["player_walk_1", "player_walk_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

## Godot Export Content Verification

Verify AtlasTexture contains correct Rect2 and resource references.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_idle", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_1", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_2", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "palette", "name": "coin_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{g}": "#FFD700"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "coin", "palette": "coin_pal", "size": [3, 3], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "walk", "frames": ["player_walk_1", "player_walk_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

## Godot Export with Sprite Origins

Sprites with origin metadata preserve positioning information.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_idle", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_1", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player_walk_2", "palette": "player_pal", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 3, 2]}, "h": {"rect": [1, 2, 3, 1]}, "c": {"rect": [1, 3, 3, 1]}}}
{"type": "palette", "name": "coin_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{g}": "#FFD700"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "coin", "palette": "coin_pal", "size": [3, 3], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 3, 3]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "walk", "frames": ["player_walk_1", "player_walk_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="godot_origin">
</div>

## libGDX Atlas Export

Export atlas metadata to libGDX TextureAtlas format for RPG game items.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="libgdx">
</div>

## libGDX Atlas Format

Verify the text-based .atlas format structure.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="libgdx_format">
</div>

## libGDX Animation Indices

Animation frames get sequential index values for sprite sheet animation.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

## libGDX Export with Offsets

Sprites with origin metadata export as offset values.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

## libGDX Export File Generation

Generate .atlas file to disk.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

## libGDX Filter Modes

Configure texture filtering for different rendering styles.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

## libGDX Repeat Modes

Configure texture wrapping for tiling textures.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

## libGDX Export via Trait

Use the Exporter trait for generic export handling.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "item_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#888888", "{g}": "#404040", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{b}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sword", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [4, 8], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 5]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 5, 2, 3]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [0, 3]}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "shield", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [6, 6], "regions": {"s": {"rect": [0, 0, 6, 6]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_1", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "potion_2", "palette": "item_pal", "size": [3, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 1, 3, 3]}, "g": {"rect": [1, 0, 1, 1]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "potion_shimmer", "frames": ["potion_1", "potion_2"], "duration": "200ms"}
```

</div>

## Unity Atlas Export

Export atlas metadata to Unity format for UI components.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "ui_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{n}": "#888888", "{h}": "#AAAAAA", "{p}": "#666666", "{c}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_normal", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"n": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_hover", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"h": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_pressed", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"p": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "icon_check", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [8, 8], "regions": {"c": {"points": [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6], [4, 5], [5, 4], [6, 3], [7, 2]]}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="unity">
</div>

## Unity Export File Generation

Generates JSON metadata and .meta texture import settings.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "ui_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{n}": "#888888", "{h}": "#AAAAAA", "{p}": "#666666", "{c}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_normal", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"n": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_hover", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"h": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_pressed", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"p": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "icon_check", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [8, 8], "regions": {"c": {"points": [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6], [4, 5], [5, 4], [6, 3], [7, 2]]}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="unity_files">
</div>

## Unity Texture Meta File

Verify .meta file contains TextureImporter settings with sprite slices.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "ui_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{n}": "#888888", "{h}": "#AAAAAA", "{p}": "#666666", "{c}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_normal", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"n": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_hover", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"h": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_pressed", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"p": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "icon_check", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [8, 8], "regions": {"c": {"points": [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6], [4, 5], [5, 4], [6, 3], [7, 2]]}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="unity_meta">
</div>

## Unity Export Filter Modes

Configure texture filtering for different use cases.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "ui_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{n}": "#888888", "{h}": "#AAAAAA", "{p}": "#666666", "{c}": "#00FF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_normal", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"n": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_hover", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"h": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "button_pressed", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [16, 8], "regions": {"p": {"rect": [0, 0, 16, 8]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "icon_check", "palette": "ui_pal", "size": [8, 8], "regions": {"c": {"points": [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6], [4, 5], [5, 4], [6, 3], [7, 2]]}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="unity_filter">
</div>
